abstract: Google is introducing a new feature in Gmail called Priority inbox that it hopes will better highlight important e-mails.
snippet: Google is introducing a new feature in Gmail called Priority inbox that it hopes will better highlight important e-mails.
lead_paragraph: If you hate your inbox, if the very thought of it makes you fretful and nauseated, you’re not alone. Plenty of people who use e-mail on a daily basis feel the same.

headline.main: Google Offers Respite From Inbox Overload

abstract: In its effort to challenge Facebook, Google has become a social butterfly. The latest proof of that is Google’s acquisition of SocialDeck, a maker of social games for mobile phones, VentureBeat reported.
snippet: In its effort to challenge Facebook, Google has become a social butterfly. The latest proof of that is Google’s acquisition of SocialDeck, a maker of social games for mobile phones, VentureBeat reported.
lead_paragraph: In its effort to challenge Facebook, Google has become a social butterfly. The latest proof of that is Google’s acquisition Monday of SocialDeck, a maker of games for mobile phones, VentureBeat reported.
